title: Technological Advancement
author: Elvis
content: This is the body of the blog about technological advancement and it is just a test run of what I am currently doing right now. SO I just keep type so I can have more content because this is supposed to be a body of the blog. So if you are reading this and you have a better Idea as to how I can get more content or you even want to add it yourself, feel free, thank you
